The 3 Laws of Gandhi

See No Sales

"Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed. The discount is a lie. The FOMO is manufactured.

Hear No Hype

Influencers monetize your insecurity. They sell you solutions to problems you didn't have. Unfollow. Unsubscribe. Find peace in silence.

Speak No Flex

Your new sneakers don't make you interesting. Flex is the emptiest form of communication. Save your words. Save your money.

The Holy Audit

WE ARE WATCHING YOU SPEND

Total Surveillance

We sync with your email, SMS, and WhatsApp. That "secret" Amazon order? We saw it. Consider us the all-seeing financial eye.

Life Currency™

That ₹1,20,000 phone is 62 days of your mortal existence. We convert rupees to hours of life.

BILL OF SIN

Ascetic Streaks

Track days without unnecessary spending. Gamify your self-control. Gandhi fasted for freedom. You fast for a down payment.

Arsenal of Truth

Tools forged in the fires of financial discipline

Auto Sync

Email crawling. Zero manual entry. Your spending secrets extracted automatically.

Tax Math

Calculate what you owe the system. No surprises. Only brutal honesty.

Future Vision

AI-powered predictions. See your financial future before you ruin it.

Bill Vault

Every receipt tracked. Every bill remembered. Your paper trail immortalized.

Live Roast
U
"Should I buy these limited edition sneakers? They're on sale, down from ₹12,000 to ₹8,000."
AI

Let me translate. You earn ₹400/hour. Those sneakers cost ₹8,000. That's 20 hours of your finite existence—2.5 full working days.

Gandhi walked 240 miles for salt. You want to spend 20 hours of life for rubber and branded canvas? The "sale" is a cognitive trap.

"Be the change you wish to see" starts with not buying things to impress people you don't like.

Stop spending.
Start living.

"Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever."
— But maybe don't spend as if credit cards are free money.

Gandhi.

Non-violent resistance to consumerism.
